Я никогда в жизни не стал бы брать эту игру, если бы не Orange Box от Valve. Зашёл в эту игру, бесцельно побегал 8 минут и удалил. Был удивлён рабочим до сих пор серверам, однако, несмотря на это, игру не рекомендую. Играйте в Counter Strike 1.6 - движок тот же, а душу греет.

This game is trash. A broken relic of the early days of PC gaming. There's only a couple servers left and if there's anyone in them you can bet your bottom dollar that they're a script kiddie hacking. The glory days ended for this game decades ago. The same people changing their user names and playing the same maps over and over. Maybe you like being picked off by a squad of drunk zoomers using aim bots. If so, this game is for you: a masochist who likes bad graphics and being fodder for hackers. Valves anti-cheat tech is completely useless for this game. Thanks Gaben! 

The only people still playing are the ones who have hacks, the admins who dont care that they use them, people who have been playing the game non stop for decades and cant possibly let go at this point, and unsuspecting and curious TF2 refugees who don't realize what kind of a ses pool they dropped into wanting to see where TF2 came from. 

I can't NOT recommend this game enough! It's dead and being kept in a coma on life support by the glee of cackling aim botters on adderall. 

1/10 for nostalgia and that's generous.

The Absolute Apex of human engineering and design. Team Fortress Classic is the absolute pinnacle of level, art, and gameplay design. The amount of thought, dedication, and time put into this mere accomplishment of a product is astronomical. A absolutely flawless title that keeps on providing new experiences 20 years after its release. Team Fortress Classic not only pushes the mere boundary of the concepts that make up a video game, it also pushes the boundaries of the mere concept of “video games” as a whole. Something as legendary and magical as Team Fortess Classic is a once in a mellonoim gift to mankind that just cannot be understood nor replicated. Team Fortress Classic is not only just a game, it’s a experience. A truly outter world experience that will immerse you in a beautiful world not yet touched from the horrors of humanity. A experience that cannot just be described with words alone with our limited vocabulary. Words do not do this absolute accomplishment justice but if I had to sum up my final verdict on this absolute masterpiece, I’d say, Team Fortress Classic is a truly legendary game.
it isnt as bad as people say it is
Awesome!!!!
quake fortress
Not bad game
Team Fortress 2 with no bots, hackers and heaters.

Team Fortress Classic is a Great game in the TF series, but sadly isn't as good as it's predecessor Quake mod in several ways. If Valve were to Open Source this game and allow the community to make changes that they want (E.G. Bring back Bunnyhopping, add new maps and include new balance changes) it would become a lot more popular, but the main thing holding it back is that this product costs money, while both it's successor and predecessor are completely free to play. make this game also Free to play and it will gain a LOT  more of an audience!
If this game had more players I'd play it more often. At least there are no bots

Игра хоть и не очень дорогая, но всё же свои денег уж точно не стоит! Так же не до конца понятно кто будет в это играть и для чего? Одно ясно, что игра с божескими системными требованиями, поэтому если хочется поиграть в Team Fortress на микроволновке, то игра клад для таких странных особ! Но всё-таки если у человека вместо компьютера калькулятор, то есть Counter-Strike 1.6 (хочется отметить, что Steam версия Counter-Strike 1.6 в отличии от Team Fortress Classic будет на ровном месте терять FPS)!
